item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m French and live in Switzerland with my family I’m curious and enjoy learning new things I love playing guitar, painting, and playing games I speak French, English, and a bit of Spanish

item.title: Vincent Thiery
item.description: Experiences Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) @ Edgelab Since Sep 2021 Responsible for developing and implementing Edgelab’s information security program. Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) @ Edgelab Since Jan 2020 Building a scalable, secure, and flexible infrastructure using the Hashicorp stack (Terraform, Packer, Consul, Nomad, and Vault) on AWS. Our SRE team also helps developers to confidently deploy their microservices in production by: providing a CI/CD platform using Jenkins and Github Actions offering a complete monitoring suite, leveraging Prometheus, the ELK stack, Jaeger, and Opsgenie We also help developers to troubleshoot bugs and performance issues in their microservices (mostly Go and Python).
